forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 51. South southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the quiet of the night gives way to the soft embrace of dawn in Downtown San Francisco, a delicate clarity blankets the city. The forecast heralds a day of sunshine, promising a high around 65 degrees. The atmosphere, unmarred by fog, invites you to take in the expansive views, where the Golden Gate Bridge stands elegantly against the cerulean sky, unwrapped from the usual marine layer that often shrouds its grandeur. A gentle breeze whispers through the neighborhoods, a mere precursor to the warmth that will unfurl as the sun rises higher, casting its golden glow.

What a splendid day to venture outside, perhaps to stroll along the Embarcadero or explore the charming corners of the Mission District, where murals tell stories of the streets. A light jacket or layered clothing will serve you well, allowing for comfort as the temperatures slowly descend in the late afternoon. Perfect for a midday coffee ritual or a leisurely lunch in one of the outdoor cafes, today unfolds with an invitation to breathe in the crisp air and enjoy the vibrant energy of the city as it stretches awake and moves through the rhythm of the day.
